## User Story

- [ ] `As a(n) [user type]`
- [ ] `In order to [extract business value]`
- [ ] `When I [take some action]`
- [ ] `(and [take some other action])`
- [ ] `I should [observe an outcome]`
- [ ] `(and I [observe another outcome])`
